props.left: Designates that the avatar is on the left side of a component. This is hooked into by components such as [MChip](/blazor/components/chips) and [MButton](/blazor/components/buttons).
props.right: Designates that the avatar is on the right side of a component. This is hooked into by components such as [MChip](/blazor/components/chips) and [MButton](/blazor/components/buttons).
